text: Allah yanatanze (urundi) rugero rw’abantu babiri; umwe muri bo utavuga ndetse ntagire icyo ashoboye, ahubwo ari umutwaro kuri shebuja; aho amutumye hose ntagire icyiza azana. Ese (umuntu nk’uwo) ashobora kureshya n’ubwiriza (abantu) kurangwa n’ubutabera, ndetse na we ubwe akaba ari mu nzira igororotse
